players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "I investigated Alice last night and she is the mafioso. We must vote her out today."
You: "Bob is lying! If he was really the detective, why would he reveal himself so early and make himself a target? This is a desperate mafia play!"
Charlie: "I believe Bob is the detective. His claim makes sense and he has no reason to lie as town. Alice's defense feels desperate."
Charlie: "Alice's reaction is classic mafia deflection. Bob's detective claim is credible and we should vote Alice out immediately."
Bob: "Alice, your deflection is transparent. I am the detective and my investigation is clear. Charlie, stand with me to vote Alice out and win this for the town."

You: "Charlie, think about this - if Bob was really detective, the mafia would kill him tonight anyway. Why would real detective out themselves Day 1 with 3 people left? He's gambling everything as mafia!"
